org.trianacode.taskgraph

Interface Cable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    InputCable, IOCable, OutputCable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CableImp, DataCable, LocalCable, QueueCable, RunnableCable

    public interface Cable

        Adds a cable listener to this cable.

      • removeCableListener

        Removes a cable listener from this cable.

      • getType

        java.lang.String getType()
        Returns:
        the type of the cable

      • isConnected

        boolean isConnected()
        Returns:
        true is this cable is connected.

      • getSendingNode

        Node getSendingNode()
        Returns:
        the node which sends data along this cable

      • getSendingTask

        Task getSendingTask()
        Returns:
        the task which sends data (via a node) along this cable

      • getReceivingNode

        Node getReceivingNode()
        Returns:
        the node which receives data along this cable

      • getReceivingTask

        Task getReceivingTask()
        Returns:
        the task which receives data (via a node) along this cable

      • contains

        boolean contains(Node node)
        Returns:
        true if the specified node sends data to or receives data from this cable

      • connects

        boolean connects(Task task)
        Returns:
        true if the specified task sends data to or receives data from this cable

      • connect

        void connect(Node sendnode,
           Node recnode)
             throws CableException
        Connect two nodes with this cable.
        Throws:
        CableException

      • reconnect

        void reconnect(Node recnode)
               throws CableException
        Reconnects the cable to receive from/send to the specified node
        Throws:
        CableException

      • disconnect

        void disconnect()
                throws CableException
        Disconnect this cable from its nodes. Note that a disconnected cable cannot be reconnected.
        Throws:
        CableException
